column4: i really want to open my torrent files, and i download a bittorent client but when i install any theres an error. how could i resolve my problem?
yeah but there is no gnome-bittorent in application>internet , it means that there is no bittorent or not yet install.
open a terminal and type gnome-btdownload
in a terminal type: sudo apt-get install gnome-btdownload
